org.apache.openmeetings.webservice

Class FileWebService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.FileWebService

  • @Produces(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
@Path(value="/file")
public class FileWebService
extends Object
    Contains methods to import and upload files into the Files section of the conference room and the personal drive of any user
    Author:
    sebawagner

      FileImportError[] importFile(String SID, String externalUserId, Long externalFileId, String externalType, Long room_id, boolean isOwner, String path, Long parentFolderId, String fileSystemName)
      Import file from external source to upload a file to a room-drive you specify: externalUserId, user if of openmeetings user for which we upload the file room_id = openmeetings room id isOwner = 0 parentFolderId = 0 to upload a file to a private-drive you specify: externalUserId, user if of openmeetings user for which we upload the file room_id = openmeetings room id isOwner = 1 parentFolderId = -2
      FileImportError[] importFileByInternalUserId(String SID, Long internalUserId, Long externalFileId, String externalType, Long room_id, boolean isOwner, String path, Long parentFolderId, String fileSystemName)
      Import file from external source to upload a file to a room-drive you specify: internalUserId, user if of openmeetings user for which we upload the file room_id = openmeetings room id isOwner = 0 parentFolderId = 0 to upload a file to a private-drive you specify: internalUserId, user if of openmeetings user for which we upload the file room_id = openmeetings room id isOwner = 1 parentFolderId = -2

      • FileWebService

        public FileWebService()

    • Method Detail

      • importFile

        public FileImportError[] importFile(String SID,
                           String externalUserId,
                           Long externalFileId,
                           String externalType,
                           Long room_id,
                           boolean isOwner,
                           String path,
                           Long parentFolderId,
                           String fileSystemName)
                             throws org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException
        Import file from external source to upload a file to a room-drive you specify: externalUserId, user if of openmeetings user for which we upload the file room_id = openmeetings room id isOwner = 0 parentFolderId = 0 to upload a file to a private-drive you specify: externalUserId, user if of openmeetings user for which we upload the file room_id = openmeetings room id isOwner = 1 parentFolderId = -2
        Parameters:
        SID - The logged in session id with minimum webservice level
        externalUserId - the external user id => If the file should goto a private section of any user, this number needs to be set
        externalFileId - the external file-type to identify the file later
        externalType - the name of the external system
        room_id - the room Id, if the file goes to the private folder of an user, you can set a random number here
        isOwner - specify a 1/true AND parentFolderId==-2 to make the file goto the private section
        path - http-path where we can grab the file from, the file has to be accessible from the OpenMeetings server
        parentFolderId - specify a parentFolderId==-2 AND isOwner == 1/true AND to make the file goto the private section
        fileSystemName - the filename => Important WITH file extension!
        Returns:
        - array of file import errors
        Throws:
        org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException

      • importFileByInternalUserId

        public FileImportError[] importFileByInternalUserId(String SID,
                                           Long internalUserId,
                                           Long externalFileId,
                                           String externalType,
                                           Long room_id,
                                           boolean isOwner,
                                           String path,
                                           Long parentFolderId,
                                           String fileSystemName)
                                             throws org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException
        Import file from external source to upload a file to a room-drive you specify: internalUserId, user if of openmeetings user for which we upload the file room_id = openmeetings room id isOwner = 0 parentFolderId = 0 to upload a file to a private-drive you specify: internalUserId, user if of openmeetings user for which we upload the file room_id = openmeetings room id isOwner = 1 parentFolderId = -2
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as logged in
        internalUserId - the openmeetings user id => If the file should goto a private section of any user, this number needs to be se
        externalFileId - the external file-type to identify the file later
        externalType - the name of the external system
        room_id - the room Id, if the file goes to the private folder of an user, you can set a random number here
        isOwner - specify a 1/true AND parentFolderId==-2 to make the file goto the private section
        path - http-path where we can grab the file from, the file has to be accessible from the OpenMeetings server
        parentFolderId - specify a parentFolderId==-2 AND isOwner == 1/true AND to make the file goto the private section
        fileSystemName - the filename => Important WITH file extension!
        Returns:
        - array of file import errors
        Throws:
        org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException

      • addFolderByExternalUserIdAndType

        public Long addFolderByExternalUserIdAndType(String SID,
                                    String externalUserId,
                                    Long parentFileExplorerItemId,
                                    String folderName,
                                    Long room_id,
                                    Boolean isOwner,
                                    Long externalFilesid,
                                    String externalType)
                                      throws org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException
        to add a folder to the private drive, set parentFileExplorerItemId = 0 and isOwner to 1/true and externalUserId/externalUserType to a valid user
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as logged in
        externalUserId - the external file-type to identify the file later
        parentFileExplorerItemId -
        folderName - the name of the folder
        room_id - the room Id, if the file goes to the private folder of an user, you can set a random number here
        isOwner - specify a 1/true AND parentFolderId==-2 to make the file goto the private section
        externalFilesid - the external file-type to identify the file later
        externalType - the name of the external system
        Returns:
        - id of folder added
        Throws:
        org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException

      • addFolderByUserId

        public Long addFolderByUserId(String SID,
                     Long userId,
                     Long parentFileExplorerItemId,
                     String folderName,
                     Long room_id,
                     Boolean isOwner,
                     Long externalFilesid,
                     String externalType)
                       throws org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException
        to add a folder to the private drive, set parentFileExplorerItemId = 0 and isOwner to 1/true and userId to a valid user
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as logged in
        userId - the openmeetings user id
        parentFileExplorerItemId - specify a parentFolderId==-2 AND isOwner == 1/true AND to make the file goto the private section
        folderName - the name of the folder
        room_id - the room Id, if the file goes to the private folder of an user, you can set a random number here
        isOwner - specify a 1/true AND parentFolderId==-2 to make the file goto the private section
        externalFilesid - the external file-type to identify the file later
        externalType - the name of the external system
        Returns:
        - id of the folder
        Throws:
        org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException

        fileName - the file name
        room_id - the room id
        isOwner -
        Returns:
        - id of the folder

      • moveFile

        public Long moveFile(String SID,
            Long fileExplorerItemId,
            Long newParentFileExplorerItemId,
            Long room_id,
            Boolean isOwner,
            Boolean moveToHome,
            Long owner_id)
              throws org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException
        move a file or folder
        Parameters:
        SID - SID The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as logged in
        fileExplorerItemId - current file or folder id to be moved
        newParentFileExplorerItemId - new parent folder id
        room_id - room id
        isOwner - if true owner id will be set
        moveToHome - if true move to private drive
        owner_id - owner id
        Returns:
        - null
        Throws:
        org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException
